input.activity_signal: Company website found via search shows active Zoom Phone VoIP services (zoom.com/products/voip-phone) with current pricing and features. Business entity incorporated September 4, 2019 according to CA filing records. Email contact uses @zoom.us domain indicating connection to active Zoom platform.
input.product_summary: Provides VoIP phone services including unlimited domestic calls, SMS messaging, voicemail transcription, call recording, and app integrations as part of Zoom's unified communications platform.
